screen_desc: The screenshot shows the cart page of the Best Buy mobile website with the store location set to Bangor. There is an option to purchase a Best Buy Gift Card for $50 and add it to the cart, but the cart is currently empty. Below the empty cart message, there is a prompt suggesting the user can create an account to earn reward points, and a section for saved items which is also currently empty. The top of the page includes the Best Buy logo, a search bar, navigation menu, and cart icon indicating there are 16 items in the cart, suggesting that the cart count may not be updated or that the items are saved, but not present in the cart view shown.
